credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Margaret Carnegie Miller
title: Dragonfly
provenance: From Carnegies' castle, Skibo Castle,  in Scotland. A gift of Andrew Carnegie's daughter, Margaret Carnegie Miller.
description: A dragonfly lamp with a lily pad base in gold. The base is made up of lily pads with tall grass. The lampshade is amber and green stained glass with dragonflies around the sides.
name: Lamp
